metadata.title: Mesh and Object Shader Resource Preparation Commands

inlineContent.text: All mesh shaders share an argument table for each resource type, such as buffers, textures, and sampler states. These argument tables are separate from other shader types, including object shaders, each of which have their own argument tables, one for each resource type.
